sjc.analysis

Class MonotonicDataFlowFramework<E>

  • java.lang.Object
    • sjc.analysis.MonotonicDataFlowFramework<E>
  • Type Parameters:
    E - The element type of the MDF lattice.
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ReachingDefinitionAnalysis

    public abstract class MonotonicDataFlowFramework<E>
extends java.lang.Object
    This classs represents the Monotonic Data-Flow Framework (MDF) for StaticJava.
    Author:
    Robby

      • MonotonicDataFlowFramework

        public MonotonicDataFlowFramework(CFG cfg,
                                  boolean isForward,
                                  boolean isLUB)
        Instantiate MDF.
        Parameters:
        cfg - The CFG for this MDF to work on.
        isForward - The flow direction.
        isLUB - Indicates whether the MDF is using least upper bound (LUB) or greatest lower bound (GLB).
